actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend for three fiscal years the expiring health information programs under title XVII of the Public Health Service Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends title XVII of the Public Health Service Act (Health Information and Health Promotion) to extend through fiscal year 1982 the authorization of appropriations for grants and contracts under this title, other than assistance provided by the Office of Health Information, Health Promotion and Physical Fitness and Sports Medicine. Amends the Community Mental Health Centers Act to increase from $3,000,000 to $20,000,000 the level of authorization for fiscal year 1980 for consultation and education services. Extends the current level of authorization through fiscal year 1980 for financial distress grants for community mental health centers.

titles.title: A bill to extend for three fiscal years the expiring health information programs under title XVII of the Public Health Service Act, and for other purposes.
